item.description:
A BURGER place? What?! Did Adam forget his animal-friendly ways?

Have no fear, fellow vegans and vegetarians! While Luxe Burger Bar is known for their traditional meat patties, they do offer the option of substituting "Veggie Falafel" patties in their place.

For just $5.99, you get a "falafel burger" with three toppings, a sauce and a side!

Luxe Burger Bar is across the street from the Providence Place Mall and next to Union Station Brewery. We'll meet outside the front door at 1:15 before being seated.

If this meetup fills up (I have no idea if it will), please join the waiting list and I will see about making a large RSVP with the restaurant. Please don't sign up as a "MAYBE". If you don't think you can make it, wait to sign up.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a guy with a black jacket and a grey hat or try my cell: 401-699-7304.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch @ Luxe Burger Bar
